alert.note: Alert for Jasper; Lake; Newton (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 07 at 10:56PM EDT until May 08 at 1:00AM EDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of northwest Indiana, including the following areas, Jasper, Lake IN and Newton. * WHEN...Until 1100 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. Roads and streets may be flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 953 PM CDT, doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated isolated storm total rainfall of up to 2 inches across the area. The rainfall intensity has decreased to less than 0.5 inches per hour and any remaining standing water will begin to recede over the next couple hours. - Some locations that may continue to experience minor flooding include... Rensselaer, Lake Village, Roselawn, Shelby, Hanging Grove, Collegeville, Schneider, Mount Ayr, Parr, Fair Oaks, Thayer, Baileys Corner and Sumava Resorts. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: A Flood Advisory means minor flooding along waterways and other poor drainage areas is imminent or may already be occurring. Persons in the advisory area should use caution and avoid flood waters.
